metadata.title: USN-6434-1 -- PMIx vulnerability
metadata.description: Francois Diakhate discovered that PMIx did not properly handle race  conditions in the pmix library, which could lead to unwanted privilege escalation. An attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain ownership of an arbitrary file on the filesystem, under the default configuration of the application.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6434-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-pmix - 4.1.2-2ubuntu1+esm1 libpmix-dev - 4.1.2-2ubuntu1+esm1 libpmix2 - 4.1.2-2ubuntu1+esm1 libpmix-bin - 4.1.2-2ubuntu1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
